title: House Main Tiltes Font
content:
Okay, so I thought it was futura, but on closer examination it looks slightly different... so what the heck is it? Whatever it is it’s beautiful, and I usually don’t like the pointy A, N, Ms

(appologies if this has been asked before but a quick search turned up no results)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [house1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110523/http:/typophile.com/files/house1.png) | 926.73 KB |
| [house3.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110523/http:/typophile.com/files/house3.png) | 981.17 KB |
author: adamschoales

comments.content:
So it IS century gothic... hmmm it looks so much uglier whenever else they use it in the regular credits over the show.

I guess when its light, its pretty. lol
The wide letter spacing doesn’t hurt.

Ahh maybe thats part of it.

It’s strange, when they use it for the crew credits once the show starts it looks absolutely awful!

At least to me.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110523im_/http:/typophile.com/files/craptype_5646.png)
It doesn’t help that they’ve stretched it horizontally.
Okay, so they DID mess with it. I thought it looked wrong.
